verification_steps.description: Verify manifest fields present via DevTools/Application
verification_steps.expected: All required fields: name, short_name, start_url, display, theme_color, background_color, icons
verification_steps.notes: Manifest loaded from /manifest.json with all fields correct. name=DancyMeals, display=standalone, 4 icons.

verification_steps.description: Check service worker is registered and active
verification_steps.expected: Service worker registered at root scope, state: activated

verification_steps.description: Simulate offline and verify offline page appears
verification_steps.expected: Branded DancyMeals offline page with friendly message
verification_steps.notes: Title: DancyMeals - Offline, shows wifi-off icon, brand, message, Try Again button

verification_steps.description: Verify Try Again button reloads when clicked
verification_steps.expected: Page attempts to reload and returns to app if online
verification_steps.notes: After going back online, clicking Try Again loaded the register page at /register successfully

verification_steps.expected: Manifest link, SW registered, HTTPS, standalone display, icons present
verification_steps.notes: All installability criteria met: HTTPS, manifest, SW activated, apple meta tags, 192 and 512 icons

verification_steps.description: Verify manifest icons accessible at defined paths
verification_steps.expected: All 4 icon files return 200 with image/png content type
verification_steps.notes: All 4 icons (icon-192, icon-512, maskable-192, maskable-512) return HTTP 200 image/png

edge_cases.case: Browser does not support service workers
edge_cases.notes: Registration script guards with serviceWorker in navigator check

edge_cases.case: User on offline page when connectivity returns
edge_cases.expected: Try Again navigates back to last attempted URL
edge_cases.notes: Verified: clicking Try Again after going online loaded /register correctly

edge_cases.expected: New SW activates on next visit with cache cleanup
edge_cases.notes: SW has skipWaiting(), clients.claim(), and caches.delete() for old cache cleanup
